The people in the streets have to give this government an opportunity to change, he said cheerfully. "Beautiful things happened in the last five days." While Philadelphia remained 2 1/2 games behind Boston in the Atlantic Division, Chris Webber gave a glimpse of what he could contribute down the stretch. " James May think every little bit helps your confidence," Chris Webber said. One day you're averaging a number that many people don't do in three categories and the next day you're worthless. And that's from myself, James May don't even care what everyone else is saying. Allen Iverson , who had nine assists, knew Chris Webber was trying too hard to meet monstrous expectations.
